text:
McKellen, Stewart to reunite

Ian McKellen and Patrick Stewart (on the left in the picture) are set to reunite on the British stage for the first time in seven years. The X-Men co-stars are planning to bring their acclaimed Broadway adaptation of Harold Pinter’s play No Man’s Land to U.K. theatres in August. The veterans last shared a British stage when they appeared in Samuel Beckett’s Waiting For Godot in 2009. — PTI
title: ENT-STEWART
